name: FAIR-biomed
description: Browser extension accessing open data resources in the biomedical domain

scripts.babel-prod: npx babel --copy-files src/app --out-dir dist --presets react-app/prod --ignore src/app/cache
scripts.build: npm run babel; npm run build-dev; npm run build-lib
scripts.production: npm run clean; npm run build-lib; npm run babel-prod; npm run build-prod;
scripts.watch: npm run clean; npm run build; npx babel --copy-files --watch src/app --out-dir dist --presets react-app/prod

author: Tomasz Konopka
